description: The TCS3200 Color Sensor is a complete color detector that includes a TAOS TCS3200 RGB sensor chip and four white LEDs. It can detect and measure a nearly limitless range of visible colors, converting light intensity into a frequency output proportional to the intensity of the selected color.

other: High‑resolution conversion of light intensity to frequency
Programmable color and full‑scale output frequency

getting_started.connection_guide: VCC to 5 V, GND to GND, S0 to D3, S1 to D4, S2 to D5, S3 to D6, OUT to D2. OE is active low and can be tied to GND for always enabled.

example_code.explaination: The sketch configures the sensor to output frequency for each color by selecting the appropriate photodiode filter via S2/S3. It counts pulses on the OUT pin using an interrupt and prints the counts for red, green, and blue.
